Package controllers

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
controllers.SearchController
public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
Search Controller provides help to the user to search pictures by Tag and Date Range and displaying the results in a Table View
Author:
Hunter Brady, Alex Rivera

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage) throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      mainStage - this will start the Photo Search Page
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - produced when no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.
      java.io.IOException - produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • initData

      public void initData​(UserList ul, int u)
      User list initialization. This method keeps track of the current user and album that the application is being operated on.
      Parameters:
      ul - User List instance
      u - user index in user list

    • search1

      public void search1​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method that allows user to perform a photo search using one tag only
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Search 1 button) that is triggered upon user action and it provides functionality to search by 1 Tag

    • and

      public void and​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Search on Tag 1 and Tag 2 button) that is triggered upon user action and provides functionality to search by 2 tags using the "and" operator logic

    • or

      public void or​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Search on Tag 1 or Tag 2 button) that is triggered upon user action and provides functionality to search by 2 tags using the "or" operator logic

    • build

      public void build​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      This method allows the user to build an album based on the result of the user's search
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Build Album button) that is triggered upon user action
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • dateSearch

      public void dateSearch​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method that allows user to perform a photo search by using a date range
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Search By Date Range button) that is triggered upon user action

    • logout

      public void logout​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Method to logout. It is set to take the user back to the Login page
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Logout button) that is triggered upon user action
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - produced when no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.

    • cancel

      public void cancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      On cancel search, the application will return to album view
      Parameters:
      e - this is the event handler (Cancel Search button) that is triggered upon user action
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - produced when no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.

    • convertToLD

      public java.time.LocalDate convertToLD​(java.lang.String date)
      This method converts a String to a date. This is used on search by date
      Parameters:
      date - the String date input by the user
      Returns:
      null or String converted to date
